title: New America (organization) - Wikipedia
snippet: The organization is headquartered in Washington, D.C., and also has offices in Oakland, California and Chicago, Illinois. Ted Halstead served as New America's founding president and CEO from 1999 to 2007. Steve Coll served as New America's second president, before being succeeded by Anne-Marie ...
